title: CES 2026: LG to debut new CLOiD humanoid robot for the home
description:
LG debuts the CLOiD humanoid robot at CES 2026, a dual-armed home assistant designed to automate daily household chores.

The post CES 2026: LG to debut new CLOiD humanoid robot for the home appeared first on The Robot Report.
